FAQ

What barcode formats are supported?

Currently supports Code 128, EAN-13, EAN-8, and Code 39 formats.

What is Code 128?

Code 128 is a high-density linear barcode symbology that can encode all 128 ASCII characters.

What is EAN-13?

EAN-13 is a 13-digit barcode standard used for retail products worldwide.
